query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ingredients (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('coffee', 'milk', 'sugar', 'syrup', 'powder', 'other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'kg',
  currentStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  minStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  maxStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 100,
  pricePerUnit DECIMAL(15,2),
  supplierId INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cleaning_supplies (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('tablets', 'liquid', 'powder', 'wipes', 'other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pcs',
  currentStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  minStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
  maxStock DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 100,
  pricePerUnit DECIMAL(15,2),
  supplierId INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS spare_parts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  partNumber VARCHAR(100),
  category ENUM('grinder', 'pump', 'heater', 'valve', 'sensor', 'motor', 'filter', 'other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  compatibleModels TEXT,
  currentStock INT DEFAULT 0,
  minStock INT DEFAULT 0,
  pricePerUnit DECIMAL(15,2),
  supplierId INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS warehouse_zones (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  zoneType ENUM('main', 'cold', 'chemical', 'parts') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'main',
  address VARCHAR(500),
  capacity INT DEFAULT 1000,
  currentFill INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_movements (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouseZoneId INT,
  itemType ENUM('ingredient', 'cleaning', 'spare_part') NOT NULL,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  movementType ENUM('in', 'out', 'transfer', 'adjustment') NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  reason VARCHAR(500),
  performedBy INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS contractors (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contractorType ENUM('supplier', 'service', 'logistics') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'supplier',
  contactPerson VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  telegramUsername VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(500),
  services TEXT,
  rating DECIMAL(2,1) DEFAULT 0,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
